mapper.select:
SELECT ap1.id as id, ap1.`name` as name, ap1.parent_id as parentId, ap1.sort as sort, ap1.url as url FROM admin_permission ap1 WHERE ap1.id IN
(SELECT ap.parent_id as parentId FROM admin_user a LEFT JOIN admin_role ar ON ar.role_id = a.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = ar.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_permission ap ON rp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE a.username = #{username} and ap.parent_id !='' ORDER BY ap.sort) AND ap1.parent_id ='' GROUP BY ap1.id ORDER BY ap1.id

SELECT ap.id as id, ap.`name` as name, ap.parent_id as parentId, ap.sort as sort, ap.url as url FROM admin_user a LEFT JOIN admin_role ar ON ar.role_id = a.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.role_id = ar.role_id LEFT JOIN admin_permission ap ON rp.permission_id = ap.id WHERE a.username = #{username} and ap.parent_id !='' ORDER BY ap.sort
SELECT T2.ROLE_NAME AS roleName, T2.ROLE_ID AS roleId FROM ADMIN_USER T1 LEFT JOIN ADMIN_ROLE T2 ON T2.ROLE_ID = T1.ROLE_ID WHERE T1.USERNAME=#{username}
